answers.answer: I'm 33 weeks and still working. I work in a warehouse 10 hrs on my feet. My last appt my doctor said I can only work 4 hrs now since im at risk for preeclampsia
Im 36w today and today is my last day working :)

I'm 22w tomorrow and I'm still working. I work verypart time with shifts no longer than 6 hours cause I'm on my feet. I take more breaks to eat and rest but I work in a salon with a bunch of women who are all mommies so they know what's up. :)
But I do take care of my 9mo old all day and take care of the house too so its like non stop working lol
Im currently 30.3 but I already gave my leave day of 37 weeks.
Wow I don't know how y'all are making it that long lol I'm a ftm and this is so hard on my body :) all worth it though
My doctor said i have to be done @ 32 weeks because i do alot of heavy lifting i do at my work.
I'm almost 29 weeks and I plan on working until the day I go into labor. But I work at a daycare and can sit and my boss is very accommodating.
I worked as a housekeeper til 30 weeks when I got put on bedrest

I'm 34+3 and still working. My back has started to hurt and just recently noticed my feet swelling up. I plan on working til she decides to come. My job is starting to take a toll on me tho. I'm a dog groomer, and some days bending over to pick a dog up (even if its a small one) is starting to become a challenge.lol just taking it day by day.

Im 28+5 and work full time. 9 hr shifts 5 times a week. I plan on working till last minute. It does alot to me already, near the end of my shift my feet are swollen and my legs are literally purple. I carry all right there in my tummy so its alot on my back.
I guess it depends on the work that you do. Personally I'm a front office assistant for a Dr office so my work isnt as bad as these ladys although I do work 4 10 hr days.
I work in call center so ima work intell baby comes

question: I'm only 6 weeks and it feels like I'm ready to pop. I'm sooo exhausted and dreading the last ten mins of my break lol. Who else is working during pregnancy and when do you plan on leaving?
title: on break at work
